name: AFEdemy, Academy on Age-friendly Environments BV
goal: AFEdemy aims to achieve that age-friendly environments are implemented in Europe. We offer study tours, seminars, coaching and training to local and regional stakeholders.
interests: Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Erasmus+: Key Action 2, strategic partnerships
Horizon2020: certification age-friendly housing
Covenant on demographic Change
European innovation partnership on active and healthy ageing
